sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for January 30 - 31

day: Road Closure Scheduled for Man O War Blvd:
event: Friday January 29 at 11:30 p.m. thru Saturday January 30 at 9:00 a.m.  (times are approximate).

day: Road Closure Scheduled for Man O War Blvd:
event: Man O War Blvd CLOSED in both directions between Liberty Rd and Pink Pigeon Pkwy for beam setting operations on the Brighton Trail Project.

day: Road Closure Scheduled for Man O War Blvd:
event: Detour via Liberty Rd > Star Shoot Pkwy > Pink Pigeon Pkwy.

day: Lane Closures Scheduled for W Main St on Saturday January 30:
event: W Main St between S Broadway and Algonquin St - The roadway will be down to one lane for ice rink removal.

day: Street Closure Scheduled for W Short St on Sunday January 31:
event: W Short St CLOSED between N Mill St and Market St for equipment delivery via crane.

day: Street Closure Scheduled for W Short St on Sunday January 31:
event: Detour:  Mill > Vine > Limestone > back to Short.
UK Men's Basketball vs Texas at 8:00 p.m. at Rupp Arena.  Use added caution if traveling downtown and watch for pedestrians.
Please follow all CDC guidelines as well as Kentucky state government directives and recommendations.
